title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2023-248: Important priority package update for jackson-core
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-35116:
	An issue was discovered jackson-databind thru 2.15.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that uses cyclic dependencies.
